page.title: 06SACRISTON SCHOOL GAMES P2
page.content:
BLOCKIE A person is on.A "blockie post" is chosen.The person counts up to 100while the players run and hide out of view of the blockie post.The person on leaves the post and tries to find the others.They have to reach the post unseen and shout "cut".If they are spotted the person on races them to the post and shouts "Block 1,2,3.. (name)..".The first player blocked is on next,but the game continueduntil all are found.
SKIPPING,TWO-BALLER,CLAPPING -lots of rhymes.
FOOTBALL Some boys play football with a tennis ball.
